## Checksum

Checksum class

### Parameters

-   `options` **{chunkSize: [number][6]?}** 

### calculateMd5

Calculates the MD5 checksum of the provided file

#### Parameters

-   `file` **[Object][7]** 

Returns **[Promise][8]&lt;any>** 

### readSlice

Reads a chunk of the provided file and appends it to the Spark Array Buffer

Returns **[Promise][8]&lt;any>**
